mapper.insert: insert into biz_mo ( mo_file_id, clothing_type, manufactory, status, create_date, create_user ) values ( #{moFileId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{clothingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=com.chinesedreamer.eir.domain.typehandler.ClothingTypeHandler}, #{manufactory,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=com.chinesedreamer.eir.domain.typehandler.MoManufactoryTypeHandler}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.chinesedreamer.eir.domain.typehandler.MoStatusTypeHandler}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
